comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I identified everyone and have tried to write biographies for each person that wasn't in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rómulo Sebastián Naón en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joseph_Rucker_Lamar en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Domicio_da_Gama en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frederick_William_Lehmann en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eduardo_Suarez_Mujica

comment._content: Richard Arthur Norton: Thanks for the full names here.  We'll include this info. next time we update the description.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Wystan:  Thanks for catching Bain's typo in the caption and for bringing this set of  images related to the peace conference in Niagara Falls together.
